price: 109. En aan Allah behoort alles wat in de hemelen en de aarde is. En alle zaken keren terug tot Allah.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
